description.value:
There's a hidden code that powers the universe and realms beyond, and somehow you can tap into it by focusing your intellectâ€”you can see the equations. By manipulating probability to suit your strategic needs, you can control the flow of combat just as well as the flow of a conversation or strings of digital information.

Spellcasting Tradition arcane

Paradox Skill Computers

Quantum Field You see and understand infinite possibilities and complex theoretical equations as clearly as though they were etched into your surroundings. When you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo], you can apply the result against two related creatures, hazards, unattended objects, and effects in your quantum field. Whenever you sustain your quantum field, you can Seek or Recall Knowledge against an appropriate target in your quantum field as a free action.
